channel.title: CreativeScape problem!
channel.description:
[b]Okay so , my problem is when i click run.bat , client load's up properly after that i put name and password and click login and BAM there is the problem , my screen is black and in the center text :[/b] [b]Loading-Please Wait ![/b]
I waited for 10 mins nothing changed , i downloaded latets java then the oldest , no changes .
[size=18pt][b]Can someone help me please ! [/b][/size]

item.title: CreativeScape problem!
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

That usually happens if the client is incompatible from my experience.

Read full topic
